Â 
Write a program that will reverse the letters in each of a sequence of words while preserving the order of the words themselves.

Input
The first line of the input contains an integer T denoting the number of test cases.
Each test case will consist of a single line of text Words are contiguous stretches of printable characters delimited by white space.

Output
For each test case, output a single line containing same words as the input. However, the letters within each word must be reversed

Example
Input:
3
I love you.
You love me.
We're a happy family.

Output:
I evol .uoy
uoY evol .em
er'eW a yppah .ylimaf
